verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, put forth <WH2330> <WH8798> a riddle <WH2420>, and speak <WH4911> <WH8798> a parable <WH4912> unto the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>;

And say <WH559> <WH8804>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; A great <WH1419> eagle <WH5404> with great <WH1419> wings <WH3671>, longwinged <WH83> <WH750>, full <WH4392> of feathers <WH5133>, which had divers colours <WH7553>, came <WH935> <WH8804> unto Lebanon <WH3844>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> the highest branch <WH6788> of the cedar <WH730>:

He cropped off <WH6998> <WH8804> the top <WH7218> of his young twigs <WH3242>, and carried <WH935> <WH8686> it into a land <WH776> of traffick <WH3667>; he set <WH7760> <WH8804> it in a city <WH5892> of merchants <WH7402> <WH8802>.

He took <WH3947> <WH8799> also of the seed <WH2233> of the land <WH776>, and planted <WH5414> <WH8799> it in a fruitful <WH2233> field <WH7704>; he placed <WH3947> <WH8804> it by great <WH7227> waters <WH4325>, and set <WH7760> <WH8804> it as a willow tree <WH6851>.

And it grew <WH6779> <WH8799>, and became a spreading <WH5628> <WH8802> vine <WH1612> of low <WH8217> stature <WH6967>, whose branches <WH1808> turned <WH6437> <WH8800> toward him, and the roots <WH8328> thereof were under him: so it became a vine <WH1612>, and brought forth <WH6213> <WH8799> branches <WH905>, and shot <WH7971> <WH8762> forth sprigs <WH6288>.

There was also another <WH259> great <WH1419> eagle <WH5404> with great <WH1419> wings <WH3671> and many <WH7227> feathers <WH5133>: and, behold, this vine <WH1612> did bend <WH3719> <WH8804> her roots <WH8328> toward him, and shot forth <WH7971> <WH8765> her branches <WH1808> toward him, that he might water <WH8248> <WH8687> it by the furrows <WH6170> of her plantation <WH4302>.

It was planted <WH8362> <WH8803> in a good <WH2896> soil <WH7704> by great <WH7227> waters <WH4325>, that it might bring forth <WH6213> <WH8800> branches <WH6057>, and that it might bear <WH5375> <WH8800> fruit <WH6529>, that it might be a goodly <WH155> vine <WH1612>.

Say <WH559> <WH8798> thou, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Shall it prosper <WH6743> <WH8799>? shall he not pull up <WH5423> <WH8762> the roots <WH8328> thereof, and cut off <WH7082> <WH8779> the fruit <WH6529> thereof, that it wither <WH3001> <WH8804>? it shall wither <WH3001> <WH8799> in all the leaves <WH2964> of her spring <WH6780>, even without great <WH1419> power <WH2220> or many <WH7227> people <WH5971> to pluck it up <WH5375> <WH8800> by the roots <WH8328> thereof.

Yea, behold, being planted <WH8362> <WH8803>, shall it prosper <WH6743> <WH8799>? shall it not utterly <WH3001> <WH8800> wither <WH3001> <WH8799>, when the east <WH6921> wind <WH7307> toucheth <WH5060> <WH8800> it? it shall wither <WH3001> <WH8799> in the furrows <WH6170> where it grew <WH6780>.
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Say <WH559> <WH8798> now to the rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>, Know <WH3045> <WH8804> ye not what these things mean? tell <WH559> <WH8798> them, Behold, the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> is come <WH935> <WH8802> to Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and hath taken <WH3947> <WH8799> the king <WH4428> thereof, and the princes <WH8269> thereof, and led <WH935> <WH8686> them with him to Babylon <WH894>;

And hath taken <WH3947> <WH8799> of the king's <WH4410> seed <WH2233>, and made <WH3772> <WH8799> a covenant <WH1285> with him, and hath taken <WH935> <WH8686> an oath <WH423> of him: he hath also taken <WH3947> <WH8804> the mighty <WH352> of the land <WH776>:
That the kingdom <WH4467> might be base <WH8217>, that it might not lift itself up <WH5375> <WH8692>, but that by keeping <WH8104> <WH8800> of his covenant <WH1285> it might stand <WH5975> <WH8800>.

But he rebelled <WH4775> <WH8799> against him in sending <WH7971> <WH8800> his ambassadors <WH4397> into Egypt <WH4714>, that they might give <WH5414> <WH8800> him horses <WH5483> and much <WH7227> people <WH5971>. Shall he prosper <WH6743> <WH8799>? shall he escape <WH4422> <WH8735> that doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> such things? or shall he break <WH6565> <WH8689> the covenant <WH1285>, and be delivered <WH4422> <WH8738> ?

As I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, surely in the place <WH4725> where the king <WH4428> dwelleth that made him king <WH4427> <WH8688>, whose oath <WH423> he despised <WH959> <WH8804>, and whose covenant <WH1285> he brake <WH6565> <WH8689>, even with him in the midst <WH8432> of Babylon <WH894> he shall die <WH4191> <WH8799>.

Neither shall Pharaoh <WH6547> with his mighty <WH1419> army <WH2428> and great <WH7227> company <WH6951> make <WH6213> <WH8799> for him in the war <WH4421>, by casting up <WH8210> <WH8800> mounts <WH5550>, and building <WH1129> <WH8800> forts <WH1785>, to cut off <WH3772> <WH8687> many <WH7227> persons <WH5315>:

Seeing he despised <WH959> <WH8804> the oath <WH423> by breaking <WH6565> <WH8687> the covenant <WH1285>, when, lo, he had given <WH5414> <WH8804> his hand <WH3027>, and hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> all these things, he shall not escape <WH4422> <WH8735>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; As I live <WH2416>, surely mine oath <WH423> that he hath despised <WH959> <WH8804>, and my covenant <WH1285> that he hath broken <WH6331> <WH8689>, even it will I recompense <WH5414> <WH8804> upon his own head <WH7218>.

And I will spread <WH6566> <WH8804> my net <WH7568> upon him, and he shall be taken <WH8610> <WH8738> in my snare <WH4686>, and I will bring <WH935> <WH8689> him to Babylon <WH894>, and will plead <WH8199> <WH8738> with him there for his trespass <WH4603> <WH8804> that he hath trespassed <WH4604> against me.

And all his fugitives <WH4015> with all his bands <WH102> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> by the sword <WH2719>, and they that remain <WH7604> <WH8737> shall be scattered <WH6566> <WH8735> toward all winds <WH7307>: and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I the YY <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; I will also take <WH3947> <WH8804> of the highest branch <WH6788> of the high <WH7311> <WH8802> cedar <WH730>, and will set <WH5414> <WH8804> it; I will crop off <WH6998> <WH8799> from the top <WH7218> of his young twigs <WH3127> a tender one <WH7390>, and will plant <WH8362> <WH8804> it upon an high <WH1364> mountain <WH2022> and eminent <WH8524> <WH8803>:

In the mountain <WH2022> of the height <WH4791> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> will I plant <WH8362> <WH8799> it: and it shall bring forth <WH5375> <WH8804> boughs <WH6057>, and bear <WH6213> <WH8804> fruit <WH6529>, and be a goodly <WH117> cedar <WH730>: and under it shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8804> all fowl <WH6833> of every wing <WH3671>; in the shadow <WH6738> of the branches <WH1808> thereof shall they dwell <WH7931> <WH8799>.

And all the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I the YY <WH3068> have brought down <WH8213> <WH8689> the high <WH1364> tree <WH6086>, have exalted <WH1361> <WH8689> the low <WH8217> tree <WH6086>, have dried <WH3001> <WH8689> up the green <WH3892> tree <WH6086>, and have made the dry <WH3002> tree <WH6086> to flourish <WH6524> <WH8689>: I the YY <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> and have done <WH6213> <WH8804> it.
